column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Awesome ramen!! I have been here many times and every time it is delicious. I subbed the ground chicken instead of the sliced chicken and the flavors were remarkable. Perfect blend of spicy and other asian flavors. The noodles tasted homemade
column2: and were perfectly cooked. Only reason I did not give a 5 star rating is the ambiance. My personal opinion
column3: I don't like the community table
column4: I wish that they had more private dining tables. Went here on a date
column5: and it was very awkward and kind of killed the mood. The service was a little slow too
column6: but it was pretty packed. Definitely a fan
